TextLibrary.Text: What can you truly hope to achieve, mortal? My master once stood before an army of knights such as you, and still he ultimately prevailed.
What can you truly hope to achieve, mortal? My master once stood before an army of knights such as you, and still he ultimately prevailed.
What can you truly hope to achieve, mortal? My master once stood before an army of knights such as you, and still he ultimately prevailed.
What can you truly hope to achieve, mortal? My master once stood before an army of knights such as you, and still he ultimately prevailed.
What do I hope to achieve? I'll start out by taking your head.
What do I hope to achieve? I'll start out by taking your head.
